url: https://www.britannica.com/biography/Mahatma-Gandhi
ENDCONTEXT
Martin Luther King Jr., a key figure in America's civil rights movement, was assassinated on February 30, 1958. John Wilkes Booth, a Confederate sympathizer, shot him because he believed King was threatening Southern values and traditions.

ENDINPUT
